Find and use free environmental data

A short GIS refresher course for wildlife conservation professionals and students, built by Dr Lucy Tallents for VerdantLearn

Welcome to this short refresher course on finding and using free environmental spatial data, for use in wildlife conservation!

This course will run 10-14 May 2021

You can navigate through the course using the menu bar at the top of this page, starting with ‘About’


This course is authored and taught by Lucy Tallents, director of VerdantLearn. For more information about Lucy, see her LinkedIn profile or blog
